sections.title: Why build your own employer dashboard and onboarding system?
sections.content:
In today's competitive talent landscape, generic HR software often falls short. Every company has unique hiring workflows, reporting needs, and onboarding requirements. Relying on off-the-shelf solutions can mean compromising on efficiency, struggling with integrations, and paying for features you don't need.

Building your own employer dashboard and onboarding platform with an AI-powered development tool like Kliv offers complete control. This approach allows you to design a system that perfectly aligns with your recruitment strategy, cultural onboarding, and compliance needs, leading to a superior candidate and new hire experience.

sections.title: The case for a custom HR solution
sections.content:
## The pitfalls of off-the-shelf HR platforms

Many businesses experience frustration with commercially available HR and recruitment software due to:

- **Lack of Customization:** Inability to adapt to unique hiring processes or company culture.
- **Integration Headaches:** Difficulty connecting with existing payroll, CRM, or learning management systems.
- **Feature Overload/Underload:** Paying for unused features while lacking critical ones for your specific needs.
- **Data Silos:** Recruitment data often isolated from onboarding, leading to manual data transfer and errors.
- **Scalability Issues:** Difficulty adapting the system as your company grows or HR policies change.

## The advantages of a custom-built solution

Leveraging AI platforms to build your own HR applications offers distinct benefits:

### Seamless Workflow Integration
Design a system that mirrors your exact hiring and onboarding journey, from application to first day and beyond. Automate hand-offs between recruitment, HR, IT, and managers effortlessly.

### Enhanced Candidate & Employee Experience
Provide a unified portal for candidates to track their application status and for new hires to access all pre-boarding and onboarding materials, forms, and schedules. A personalized experience boosts engagement and retention.

### Targeted Data & Analytics
Track the metrics that matter most to your business â€“ time-to-hire, source effectiveness, onboarding completion rates, early employee feedback, and more, all from a single dashboard.

### Cost Efficiency in the Long Run
While there's an initial build investment, you avoid recurring subscription fees that escalate over time. Plus, you only pay for the features you actually use and need.

### Future-Proof & Adaptable
Your business evolves, and so should your tools. A custom solution can be easily modified to incorporate new compliance requirements, departmental needs, or technological advancements without vendor dependencies.

## Real-world impact

Custom employer dashboards and onboarding tools are transforming how companies manage talent:

**Tech Startups**: Dynamic dashboards tracking candidate pipeline velocity, interview feedback aggregation, and instantly provisioned access for new hires to development tools and communication platforms.

**Healthcare Systems**: Secure portals for healthcare professionals' credentialing, automated background checks, and personalized training modules specific to hospital departments before Day One.

**Retail Chains**: Streamlined onboarding for high-volume hires, allowing new store associates to complete all regional HR forms, watch orientation videos, and receive initial schedule assignments pre-employment.

**Manufacturing**: Centralized view of skilled labor availability, automated pre-employment skills testing, and digital safety training sign-offs integrated directly into the new hire's unique onboarding path.

## Building with AI

Developing sophisticated HR tools used to require specialized programming teams. AI-powered platforms like Kliv simplify this process significantly:

- **Conversational Development**: Describe your desired features in plain language, and Kliv assists in bringing them to life.
- **Modular Design**: Quickly assemble complex workflows and user interfaces from pre-built components.
- **Data Schema Generation**: Automatically set up databases to store candidate and employee information efficiently.
- **User Interface Prototyping**: Visualize your dashboard and onboarding screens as you build, iterating quickly.

## Your competitive edge

Stop trying to fit a square peg into a round hole with off-the-shelf HR software. Invest in a truly tailored solution that empowers your HR team, delights new hires, and provides actionable insights. With Kliv, creating your ideal employer dashboard and onboarding system is more accessible than ever before.

items.answer: Building a core employer dashboard and onboarding system with Kliv can take as little as a few days, depending on complexity. Granular customizations and extensive integrations might extend this to a few weeks. It's significantly faster than traditional development cycles.
items.question: How long does it take to build a custom HR dashboard?

items.answer: You don't need coding expertise. Kliv's platform is designed for natural language input, allowing you to describe your desired HR workflows and features. The AI assists in translating these into functional application components.
items.question: Is coding required to build these HR tools?

items.answer: Yes, custom-built HR tools can integrate with almost any system offering an API. This includes popular HRIS (Human Resources Information Systems), payroll software, applicant tracking systems (ATS), and learning management systems (LMS) you already use.
items.question: Can my custom HR system integrate with existing software?

items.answer: You retain full ownership of all the data, intellectual property, and code generated for your custom HR system. Kliv provides the platform for creation; the resulting application is entirely yours.
items.question: Who owns the data and the application once it's built?

items.answer: While there's an upfront cost for development, you eliminate recurring subscription fees often associated with SaaS HR platforms. A custom solution typically offers a faster ROI and greater long-term cost efficiency, especially for businesses with evolving or specific needs.
items.question: How does the cost compare to off-the-shelf HR software?

items.answer: Absolutely. One of the primary advantages is flexibility. You can easily add new modules, modify workflows, or scale capabilities as your business grows and your HR requirements change, without waiting for vendor updates or paying extra fees.
items.question: Can I modify or expand my custom HR tool after it's built?

items.answer: Building a custom system can offer superior security because you control the hosting environment, data storage, and access protocols. You are not dependent on a third-party vendor's security measures and can implement safeguards tailored to your company's risk profile.
items.question: Is a custom-built HR system secure?

items.answer: Kliv offers active support throughout the development process with AI-driven suggestions, debugging tools, and best practice recommendations. Post-launch, since you own the application, you have complete control over its maintenance and future development, either internally or with external partners.
